      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChangeLanguageAction
      Changes language of localization.
      class  CloseTabAction
      Closes current tab.
      class  CopyAction
      Copies selected text to clipboard.
      class  CutAction
      Cuts selected text to clipboard.
      class  ExitAction
      Exits from program.
      class  InvertAction
      Inverts case of selected letters.
      class  NewTabAction
      Creates new tab in JNotepadPP program
      class  OpenAction
      Opens existing document and presents it in new tab.
      class  PasteAction
      Pastes text from clipboard to text.
      class  SaveAction
      Saves current document.
      class  SaveAsAction
      Saves current document as
      class  SortAscendingAction
      Sorts selected lines in ascending order.
      class  SortDescendingAction
      Sorts selected lines in descending order.
      class  StatsAction
      Presents text statistics, lenght of text, number of non blank characters and number of lines
      class  ToLowerAction
      Changes case of selected letters to lower case.
      class  ToUpperAction
      Changes case of selected letters to upper case.
      class  UniqueAction
      Removes lines duplicates.
